name: HTC Vive Tracker
description:
Official downloadable 3D CAD file for the HTC Vive Tracker: http://community.viveport.com/t5/Developer-SDKs-and-Downloads/Vive-Tracker-SDK-and-hardware-FAQs/ba-p/5477
This is the Official 3D CAD file posted on the “Vive Developers Community” in IGS and STP file formats, I have developed the mesh conversion to OBJ file format and units setup in Centimeter in Autodesk 3Ds MAX to be able for work in any 3d software platform.

Developed by Marco Romero 3D Design Studio, licensed under CC Attribution. (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
